### getImmOpValueAsr() {#af641c8f0bf20235b08fc10826724dc8a}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;unsigned N&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>unsigned anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoongArchMCCodeEmitter.cpp&#125;::LoongArchMCCodeEmitter::getImmOpValueAsr (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; MI, unsigned OpNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &gt; &amp; Fixups, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return binary encoding of an immediate operand specified by OpNo.

The value returned is the value of the immediate shifted right Note that this function is dedicated to specific immediate types, e.g. simm14&#95;lsl2, simm16&#95;lsl2, simm21&#95;lsl2 and simm26&#95;lsl2.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchmccodeemitter-cpp/#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchmccodeemitter-cpp">LoongArchMCCodeEmitter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getImmOpValueSub1() {#acd8fc9de4306c356df340ec49acd6a38}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned LoongArchMCCodeEmitter::getImmOpValueSub1 (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; MI, unsigned OpNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &gt; &amp; Fixups, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI) const</>}>
Return binary encoding of an immediate operand specified by OpNo.

The value returned is the value of the immediate minus 1. Note that this function is dedicated to specific immediate types, e.g. uimm2&#95;plus1.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchmccodeemitter-cpp/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchmccodeemitter-cpp">LoongArchMCCodeEmitter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMachineOpValue() {#a92b2c2e6e237469e463e5a402954447b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned LoongArchMCCodeEmitter::getMachineOpValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp; MO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &gt; &amp; Fixups, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI) const</>}>
Return binary encoding of operand.

If the machine operand requires relocation, record the relocation and return zero.

</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
